aboutOP:
OnomatoPedal

OnomatoPedal is an audio playground and a series of downloadable sample packs (plus music tracks) inspired by the Japanese Onomatopoetic words and the music effects pedals of the world famous EarthQuaker Devices.
howToPlay:
How To Play

The main screen will display several EarthQuaker pedals each with a corresponding onomatopoetic word. Click on 'Shuffle Pedals' to get a new set of choices. Once you see a pedal/onomatopeia that you would like to explore, click on it.

On Desktop

You will be able to play a set of sounds with the following 12 keys on your computer keyboard: z, x, c, v, a, s, d, f, q, w, e, r.

On Mobile

Click to enter 'Play Mode', the track will start and you will see twelve drum pads. You can play along with the track or pause the track to just play the pads.
freeSamplePack:
Free Sample Pack

On the desktop version, you see an option to download the sample pack files.
